abstract: Fractional reserve is here to stay.
snippet: Fractional reserve is here to stay.
lead_paragraph: Yglesias tells us that some Occupy Wall Street protesters have picked up Ron Paulish monetary ideas -- although some know better. I thought I'd say a word about one particular idea that sounds plausible to some people but is actually quite wrong: banning fractional reserve banking.

headline.main: If Banks Are Outlawed, Only Outlaws Will Have Banks
